Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.facebook.rendercore.MountDelegateInput
    Marked for removal; check out D4182567 for context.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.facebook.litho.internal.ArraySet
    This collection uses SimpleArrayMap as backing array which static cache can be corrupted when used in multi-threaded environment. When static cache gets corrupted, next time instance is used it can crash with ClassCastException even if that instance is thread confined.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.EditText
    com.facebook.litho.TestComponent
    Use ComponentAssert APIs instead. Because this isn't generated with codegen, it can have subtle issues in tests.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.TestDrawableComponent
    Use MountSpecLifecycleTester if lifecycle assertions are needed or SimpleMountSpecTester if not.
    com.facebook.litho.TestLayoutState
    Only to be used with the deprecated ComponentTestHelper
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TransparencyEnabledCard
    com.facebook.litho.ViewCompatComponent
    ViewCompatComponent is not efficient as it will do measurement of views twice. Recommended way now is to use either ViewRenderInfo (which utilizes same interfaces as this class: ViewCreator and ViewBinder) if the view is used with sections API or create a custom MountSpec.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.facebook.litho.config.ComponentsConfiguration.ignoreNullLayoutStateError
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.facebook.litho.specmodels.internal.ImmutableList.add(E)
    com.facebook.litho.specmodels.internal.ImmutableList.add(int, E)
    com.facebook.litho.specmodels.internal.ImmutableList.addAll(Collection<? extends E>)
    com.facebook.litho.specmodels.internal.ImmutableList.addAll(int, Collection<? extends E>)
    com.facebook.litho.ComponentHost.addView(View)
    com.facebook.litho.ComponentHost.addView(View, int)
    com.facebook.litho.ComponentHost.addView(View, int, ViewGroup.LayoutParams)
    com.facebook.litho.ComponentHost.addViewInLayout(View, int, ViewGroup.LayoutParams, boolean)
    com.facebook.litho.ComponentHost.attachViewToParent(View, int, ViewGroup.LayoutParams)
    com.facebook.litho.specmodels.internal.ImmutableList.clear()
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.clearFocus(ComponentContext, String)
    Use TextInput.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.EditText.clearFocus(ComponentContext, String)
    Use EditText.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.clearFocus(EventTrigger)
    Use TextInput.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.EditText.clearFocus(EventTrigger)
    Use EditText.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.clearFocusTrigger(ComponentContext, String)
    Do not use this method to get a EventTrigger to use later. Instead give the component a Handle and use TextInput.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle).
    com.facebook.litho.widget.EditText.clearFocusTrigger(ComponentContext, String)
    Do not use this method to get a EventTrigger to use later. Instead give the component a Handle and use EditText.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle).
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.Builder.clearFocusTrigger(EventTrigger)
    Do not use this method to set an EventTrigger. Instead, set a Handle on this Component with .handle() and dispatch the trigger using the variant of TextInput.clearFocusTrigger that takes a Handle param.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.EditText.Builder.clearFocusTrigger(EventTrigger)
    Do not use this method to set an EventTrigger. Instead, set a Handle on this Component with .handle() and dispatch the trigger using the variant of EditText.clearFocusTrigger that takes a Handle param.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.ComponentAssert.containsOnlySubComponents(SubComponent...)
    Use ComponentAssert.extractingSubComponents(com.facebook.litho.ComponentContext) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.ComponentAssert.containsSubComponent(SubComponent)
    Use ComponentAssert.extractingSubComponents(com.facebook.litho.ComponentContext) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.Border.Builder.cornerEffect(float)
    Please use Border.Builder.radiusPx(int) instead
    com.facebook.litho.LithoView.create(Context, Component, boolean)
    Use LithoView.create(Context, Component) instead and set config explicitly on the ComponentTree using ComponentTree.Builder.isReconciliationEnabled(boolean).
    com.facebook.litho.sections.widget.GridRecyclerConfiguration.createWithRecyclerBinderConfiguration(int, RecyclerBinderConfiguration)
    com.facebook.litho.sections.widget.StaggeredGridRecyclerConfiguration.createWithRecyclerBinderConfiguration(int, RecyclerBinderConfiguration)
    com.facebook.litho.sections.widget.ListRecyclerConfiguration.createWithRecyclerBinderConfiguration(RecyclerBinderConfiguration)
    com.facebook.litho.specmodels.model.DelegateMethodDescription.Builder.definedParameterTypes(ImmutableList<TypeName>)
    Use DelegateMethodDescription.Builder.lifecycleMethodArguments(ImmutableList)
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.dispatchKey(ComponentContext, String, KeyEvent)
    Use #dispatchKey(ComponentContext, Handle) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.dispatchKey(EventTrigger, KeyEvent)
    Use #dispatchKey(ComponentContext, Handle) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.dispatchKeyTrigger(ComponentContext, String)
    Do not use this method to get a EventTrigger to use later. Instead give the component a Handle and use #dispatchKey(ComponentContext, Handle).
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.Builder.dispatchKeyTrigger(EventTrigger)
    Do not use this method to set an EventTrigger. Instead, set a Handle on this Component with .handle() and dispatch the trigger using the variant of TextInput.dispatchKeyTrigger that takes a Handle param.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.helper.ComponentTestHelper.dispatchOnFocusedVisibleEvent(ComponentContext, EventHandler, Component)

    com.facebook.litho.sections.widget.RecyclerBinderConfiguration.Builder.estimatedViewportCount(int)
    com.facebook.litho.Component.getEventDispatcher()
    com.facebook.yoga.YogaNode.getParent()
    Use #getOwner() instead. This will be removed in the next version.
    com.facebook.yoga.YogaNodeJNIBase.getParent()
    Use #getOwner() instead. This will be removed in the next version.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.helper.ComponentTestHelper.getSubComponent(Component.Builder, Class<T>)

    com.facebook.litho.specmodels.internal.ImmutableList.retainAll(Collection<?>)
    com.facebook.litho.testing.InteractionUtil.scrollTo(RecyclerView, int)
    as it is based on RecyclerView#computeVerticalScrollOffset() which only returns estimated scroll position, which may lead to the method hanging forever (or until hitting max iterations count) Please, consider using InteractionUtil.Scroller instead
    com.facebook.litho.specmodels.internal.ImmutableList.set(int, E)
    com.facebook.litho.LithoView.setComponentAsyncWithoutReconciliation(Component)
    Use LithoView.getComponentTree() and ComponentTree.setRootAsync(Component) instead; set the config explicitly on the ComponentTree using ComponentTree.Builder.isReconciliationEnabled(boolean).
    com.facebook.litho.LithoView.setComponentWithoutReconciliation(Component)
    Use LithoView.getComponentTree() and ComponentTree.setRoot(Component) instead; set the config explicitly on the ComponentTree using ComponentTree.Builder.isReconciliationEnabled(boolean).
    com.facebook.rendercore.visibility.VisibilityMountExtension.setRootHost(ExtensionState<VisibilityMountExtension.VisibilityMountExtensionState>, Host)
    Only used for Litho's integration. Marked for removal.

    Use #setSelection(ComponentContext, Handle) instead.

    Do not use this method to get a EventTrigger to use later. Instead give the component a Handle and use #setSelection(ComponentContext, Handle).

    Do not use this method to set an EventTrigger. Instead, set a Handle on this Component with .handle() and dispatch the trigger using the variant of TextInput.setSelectionTrigger that takes a Handle param.

    @see LithoTooltipController.showTooltip(ComponentContext, PopupWindow, String, int, int)
    com.facebook.rendercore.MountState.unregisterMountDelegateExtension(MountExtension)
    Only used for Litho's integration. Marked for removal.
    com.facebook.rendercore.MountDelegateTarget.unregisterMountDelegateExtension(MountExtension)
    Only used for Litho's integration. Marked for removal.
    com.facebook.litho.Component.willRender(ComponentContext, Component)
    Using willRender is regarded as an anti-pattern, since it will load all classes into memory in order to potentially decide not to use any of them.

  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    com.facebook.litho.annotations.ShouldUpdate.onMount
    this param is ignored. MountSpecs with pureRender will now always check shouldUpdate on the main thread if the information from layout isn't able to be used.
